text: We’re definitely interested in trying browser push notifications. When will this be in the HubSpot marketplace for testing? Out of concern for security, we won’t use any plugins until they’re officially approved or produced by a partner agency.

<@UDEASNWEB> It’s in the process of getting to the app marketplace. However, I don’t have precise information on how long it might take to be listed there.
Meanwhile, there are two options we may offer.
First, we share a HubSpot test account with you (full access) to try out the solution in a safe environment.
Second, we may tailor the push notifications solution specifically for your case and install it on your server (e.g. firebase).

Which one is better for you?
i’ll check with our IT department for their preference. thanks!
Great! DM me when you decide. Thanks <@UDEASNWEB>
